info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Schenectady, central Albany, southeastern Saratoga, southwestern Washington and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Burnt Hills to near Niskayuna to near Voorheesville. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Saratoga Springs, Cohoes, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Colonie, Mechanicville, Delmar, Latham, Guilderland, Niskayuna, Ballston Spa, Menands, Westerlo, Voorheesville, Green Island and Waterford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 7 and 24. Interstate 890 near exit 6. Interstate 87 between exits 24 and 7, and between exits 8A and 14. Interstate 787 between exits 5 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
